events.message: I received my order yesterday but want to request a refund because the item is not what I expected and I don't want to keep it.
The reported issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the item.
The case was assigned to customer support representative Jane Smith to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, I need to verify some details. Please share the order number and the reason you wish to return the item.
My order number is 123456789, and the reason for return is that the product did not match the description on your site.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund once you send the item back using our prepaid return label, which I will email to you shortly.
That sounds good. I appreciate the prepaid label, and I will send the product back as soon as I receive it.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. You should see the credit on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund, and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since we have received no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
